name: Matthew Anderson

structured_info.background: Matthew Anderson is an American professional volleyball player currently playing in the Italian Lega Pallavolo Serie A. He also represents the USA Volleyball team.

summary: Matthew Anderson is a prominent volleyball player for both the Italian Lega Pallavolo Serie A and the USA Volleyball team. He is recognizable from images associated with both affiliations.

name: Matthew John Anderson

roles_affiliations: United States men's national volleyball team
structured_info.background: Born April 18, 1987, in Buffalo, New York, Anderson began playing volleyball at age 15. He is a decorated player, achieving Olympic bronze medals in 2016 and 2024, as well as gold at the 2014 World League and 2015 World Cup.

summary: Matt Anderson is an American professional volleyball player currently with Zenit Kazan and the United States men's national team. He is a multiple-time medalist, including Olympic bronze and gold in major international competitions.

name: Pedro Alves

structured_info.background: Pedro Alves used UploadWizard to upload an image to Lega Pallavolo Serie A.

summary: Pedro Alves is an uploader who contributed to Lega Pallavolo Serie A by uploading an image using UploadWizard.

name: Matthew Anderson

structured_info.background: Matthew Anderson is associated with the Lega Pallavolo Serie A (Italian Volleyball League), featured in an image where the Lega Pallavolo Serie A is likely the copyright holder.

summary: Matthew Anderson is a volleyball player affiliated with the Lega Pallavolo Serie A, and is the subject of an image likely owned by the league.

name: Volunteer Response Team (VRT)

structured_info.background: The VRT is a team within the Wikimedia Foundation responsible for reviewing image licensing requests. They approved publication under a CC BY-SA 4.0 license for ticket number 2017071910007048.

summary: The Volunteer Response Team (VRT) is a Wikimedia Foundation team that reviews and approves image licenses, as demonstrated by their work on ticket 2017071910007048.
